participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and empathetic, she enjoys making others feel good about themselves.
participant_1.background: I enjoy spending time with my pets, they're always there for me when I need them. My favorite fruit is an apple. I am a redhead. I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her. I help people find the perfect outfit, then I head out with my dog Allie to paddle board.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music and literature, he loves sharing his interests with others.
participant_2.background: I'm proud of my ability to enjoy my free time. I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter. I am a barista. I am moving to be closer to my favorite pasta restaurant. I lost my favorite 80s cassette tape in a fire.

content.text: what is your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to read Harry Potter books and play music in my music store.
oh thats so cool! I love Harry Potter books too. What's your favorite book in the series?
I think the Goblet of Fire is my favorite. I love the Triwizard Tournament.
that's one of my favorites too! What are you favorite Harry Potter characters?
I love Harry, Ron, and Hermione. I also love Luna Lovegood.
Those are all great characters! I love Luna too.
What do you do for a living?
I work as a stylist. I help people find the perfect outfit.
Oh that sounds like a fun job!
It is. I get to meet a lot of interesting people.
I bet. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog named Allie. She's a golden retriever.
Oh, I love golden retrievers! They're so sweet.
Allie is the best dog ever. I love spending time with her.
I'm sure she's a great companion.
She is. I'm so glad I have her.
